Defines

#define CAMCTRL_1STPERSON_ACTIVE
 This define can be evaluated to check if this module is included and active.
Configuration Data
The values of these parameters can be overwritten by defining them before including this file.

#define CAMCTRL_1STPERSON_SWAY   10
 Strength of camera up/down movement during walk.
#define CAMCTRL_1STPERSON_ZOFFSET   50
 Offset for camera height.
#define CAMCTRL_1STPERSON_SPEEDMUL   2
 Multiplier for walk speed impact.
